value.fullName: Yes, the patient has a High Risk for Suicide Patient Record Flag.
value.label: Yes, the patient has a High Risk for Suicide Patient Record Flag.

value.fullName: Yes, the patient presents with a behavioral health concern or warning signs that this Veteran may be at risk for suicide, even in the absence of a primary or secondary diagnosis or a complaint of an emotional or behavioral disorder.
value.label: Yes, the patient presents with a behavioral health concern or warning signs that this Veteran may be at risk for suicide, even in the absence of a primary or secondary diagnosis or a complaint of an emotional or behavioral disorder.
